name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, expertly leveraging **Python**, **JavaScript**, **React**, and **Node.js** to deliver high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in building scalable REST APIs and maintaining code quality through **Git** and Agile methodologies.
Demonstrated ability in deploying cloud-based solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring efficient, compliant systems aligned with industry standards. Adept in problem-solving and time-management, with a strong focus on meeting deadlines without compromising quality. Additionally skilled in developing AI/ML platforms integrating predictive analytics and real-time processing using **FastAPI** and **Django**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed full-stack applications leveraging **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **Node.js**, utilizing frameworks like **React** (versions **17–18**) to deliver robust solutions.
• Integrated **REST APIs** to enhance application functionality and ensure seamless data communication between front-end and back-end systems.
• Employed **Git** for version control and collaboration on codebase, ensuring efficient workflow and code management across the team.
• Facilitated cloud deployment strategies on **AWS** and **Azure**, optimizing applications for scalability and performance enhancements.
• Practiced Agile methodologies, ensuring timely project delivery and effective team collaboration, which increased the productivity by **25%**.
• Solved complex technical challenges through innovative problem-solving techniques, reducing bug resolution time by **40%**.
• Maintained effective time-management strategies to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines consistently, achieving over **95%** of project milestones on time.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **30%** increase in scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Employed **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build interactive front-end applications, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels, enhancing user engagement by **25%**.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, improving transaction monitoring time by **40%**.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows for payments, alerts, and compliance, reducing system latency by **20%**.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing and increasing data processing efficiency by **50%**.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, reducing fraud incidents by **15%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, improving predictive accuracy by **30%**.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Developed innovative REST APIs employing **Node.js** frameworks such as **NestJS** and **Express**, enhancing system integration while supporting an Agile environment for seamless project iterations.
Implemented cutting-edge frontend applications using **React** (18), ensuring fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms through efficient component design and state management.
Leveraged cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure** for scalable infrastructure solutions, optimizing deployment times by **40%** and improving resource management for high-traffic workflows.
Engineered real-time features using event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, increasing customer satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
Executed robust version control and collaboration through **Git**, enhancing team productivity and ensuring efficient code review practices.
Applied problem-solving skills to implement Redis caching strategies for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases by **30%**.
Managed project timelines effectively, contributing to successful Agile sprints and stakeholder satisfaction while launching new features on schedule.
Utilized **Agile** methodologies to enhance workflow efficiency, resulting in an improved release cycle with up to **50%** shorter time-to-market for new features.
Developed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and robust handling of sensitive customer data.
